description: The browsingContext module contains commands and events relating to navigables.

types.description: A unique identifier for a navigable.
The type of browsing context to be created.
Unique string identifying an ongoing navigation.
Represents the stage of document loading at which a navigation command will return.
Represents the possible user prompt types.

commands.name: activate
commands.description: Activates and focuses the given top-level traversable.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The identifier of the browsing context to activate.  It is an error to pass a non-top level traversable.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The identifier of the browsing context to close.  It is an error to pass a non-top level traversable.

parameters.name: promptUnload
parameters.description: Whether to permit prompting the user from beforeunload event.

commands.name: create
commands.description: Creates a new navigable, either in a new tab or in a new window, and returns its navigable id (BidiBrowsingContext.BrowsingContext).

returns.name: context
returns.description: The identifier of the browsing context to close. It is an error to pass a non-top level traversable.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The identifier of the browsing context in which to handle a user prompt.  It is an error to pass a non-top level traversable.

commands.name: getTree
commands.description: Describes the frame tree at a particular moment in time. Returns a tree of all descendant navigables including the given parent itself, or all top-level contexts when no parent is provided.

returns.name: contexts
returns.description: Information about the matching browsing contexts.

commands.name: navigate
commands.description: Navigates a navigable to the given URL.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The identifier of the browsing context to navigate.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL to navigate to.

parameters.name: wait
parameters.description: The readiness state at which the command will return (default is 'none').

returns.name: url
returns.description: The URL the browsing context navigated to.

returns.name: navigation
returns.description: The navigation ID, or null if not applicable.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The identifier of the browsing context to reload.

returns.name: url
returns.description: The URL the browsing context navigated to.

returns.name: navigation
returns.description: The navigation ID, or null if not applicable.

events.name: navigationStarted
events.description: Event fired when navigation starts in a navigable.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Time value in milliseconds representing the current date and time in UTC.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The provisional URL being navigated to.

events.name: navigationCommitted
events.description: Event fired when navigation commits in a navigable.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Time value in milliseconds representing the current date and time in UTC.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL that navigation committed to.

events.name: navigationFailed
events.description: Event fired when navigation fails in a navigable.

parameters.name: navigation
parameters.description: The navigation ID, or null when the navigation is canceled before making progress.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Time value in milliseconds representing the current date and time in UTC.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL that failed to navigate to.

events.name: navigationAborted
events.description: Event fired when navigation is aborted in a navigable.

parameters.name: navigation
parameters.description: The navigation ID, or null when the navigation is canceled before making progress.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Time value in milliseconds representing the current date and time in UTC.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL that was being navigated to when aborted.

events.name: fragmentNavigated
events.description: Event fired when fragment navigation occurs in a navigable.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Time value in milliseconds representing the current date and time in UTC.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL with the fragment that was navigated to.

events.name: userPromptClosed
events.description: Event fired when a user prompt is dismissed in a navigable.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The identifier of the navigable that triggered the user prompt.

events.name: userPromptOpened
events.description: Event fired when a user prompt is shown in a navigable.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The identifier of the navigable that triggered the user prompt.
